{"id":508718733,"lang":"cpp","time":"9Â months","timestamp":1623838363,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/508718733/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Two Sum IV - Input is a BST","memory":"N/A","code":"/**\n * Definition for a binary tree node.\n * struct TreeNode {\n *     int val;\n *     TreeNode *left;\n *     TreeNode *right;\n *     TreeNode() : val(0), left(nullptr), right(nullptr) {}\n *     TreeNode(int x) : val(x), left(nullptr), right(nullptr) {}\n *     TreeNode(int x, TreeNode *left, TreeNode *right) : val(x), left(left), right(right) {}\n * };\n */\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    bool search(TreeNode* root,int k){\n        if(!root) return false;\n         if(root->val==k) return true;\n        if(root->left && root->val>k)if(search(root->left,k)) return true;\n        else if(root->right && root->val<k)if(search(root->right,k)) return true;\n        return false;\n    }\n    bool findTarget(TreeNode* root, int k) {\n        if(!root) return false;\n        int t=k-root->val;\n        if(t>root->val)\n            if(search(root->right,t)) return true;\n        else if(search(root->left,t)) return true;\n        return findTarget(root->left,k)||findTarget(root->right,k);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"two-sum-iv-input-is-a-bst"}
